heading: Barrel piano.
general-note: Here are entered works on the mechanical piano, used chiefly by street musicians, in which a pinned barrel or cylinder is activated by a hand crank. Works on the small organ, used chiefly by street musicians, in which a barrel with pins or staples is activated by a hand crank, are entered under. Barrel organ.. Works on the bowed string instrument, usually shaped like a viol, with a crank at the end opposite the pegbox are entered under. Hurdy-gurdy..
